items.sentence: I wanted to make sure it wasn\'t us who caused the problem.
I want to tell as many people as I can about what happened.
I wish something would fall out of the sky and land on Tom.
My grandfather sometimes talks to himself when he\'s alone.
My neighbor\'s son made fun of my daughter today at school.
Tom never would\'ve done what you\'ve accused him of doing.
Tom says he can\'t put up with Mary\'s behavior any longer.
I even wrote a speech just in case I was asked to give one.
I have a feeling something very special is going to happen.
I have fewer students in my class this year than last year.
